artist: Serge Lunal; Author: Philippe Lekeuche; Publisher: Éditions Jacques Brémond
medium: Unique paintings in green, blue, black and yellow, green and black letterpress
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis
signed: Signed in pencil by artist on artwork on the two full-page artworks in book; signed in pencil by artist and author on colophon: Lunal; Kekeuche
title: Cette maladie, au nom perdu
